content: This is a **list of cricket grounds in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. The grounds included in this list have held [List-A](/wiki/List-A_cricket) matches, all of which have come in the form of [One Day Internationals](/wiki/One_Day_International). Official name (known as)City or townCapacityEnds/notesRef[Kallang Ground](/wiki/Kallang_Ground)[Kallang](/wiki/Kallang)• National Stadium End • Pavilion End (has held neutral [One Day Internationals](/wiki/One_Day_International))[Singapore Cricket Club Ground](/wiki/Singapore_Cricket_Club_Ground)[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)• Supreme Court and Parliament House End • Pavilion End (has hosted neutral One Day Internationals)[New Singapore National Stadium](/wiki/New_Singapore_National_Stadium)[Kallang](/wiki/Kallang)52,000Proposed venueHMS Terror Barracks[Sembawang](/wiki/Sembawang)Ceylon Sports Club[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)[Indian Association Ground](/wiki/Indian_Association_Ground)[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)Police Academy Ground[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)Seletar Air Force Base[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)Tanglin Barracks Ground[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)University of Wisconsin[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) - Cricket grounds in Singapore at CricketArchive.
title: List of cricket grounds in Singapore
